price: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and earth and all that is between them, and He is Most Capable of all things.
arabic: لِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا فِيهِنَّۚ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرُۢ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
